action.primary: Disperses Blood Stagnation and stops bleeding internally and topically
Promotes the movement of Qi, clears Heat and resolves toxicity

notes: This herb has been shown to inhibit the growth of cancer cells.
This herb is a folk medicine and is not included in the Materia Medicae.
Steeped in wine or taken with water, this herb is said to cure hemorrhage due to overstrain.
This herb is said to strengthen teeth and improve eyesight.
